turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking I could use some coffee, why don't you run to Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, would you like me to run to the store around the corner?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Indeed

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is a carmel machiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: about 3 bucks I think

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, why don't you get me 2. I'll save one for later

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, I'll file an expense report wen I get back

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grab me something to eat too please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: From Starbucks? What would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A brownie, or some sort of pastry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll call you when get there so I can tell you what they have

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! send a picture of the food and I'l pick

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You've got it, Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So 2 carmel macchiatos and a picture of the display case

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, grab something for yourself too

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks boss, expect a text in about 10 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm on my way, talk to you in a bit
